input: Apple is looking at buying U.K. startup for $1 billion. Amazon.com, Inc. is located in Seattle, WA and was founded July 5th, 1994 by Jeff Bezos, allowing customers to buy everything from books to blenders. Seattle is north of Portland and south of Vancouver, BC. Other notable Seattle - based companies are Starbucks and Boeing. The D.O.J. is looking to dismantle Amazon because Donald Trump hates Jeff Bezos. Additionally, Jeff Bezos is worth 284.85 billion dollars. You can find this information in Section 10.2.1 of the AmazonWay document at http://www.amazon.com/theAmazonWay
